title: Merck Is in Advanced Talks to Buy Seagen; Deal could be worth roughly $40 billion or more
text:
Merck & Co. is in advanced talks to acquire Seagen Inc. and is aiming to finalize a purchase of the cancer biotech in the next few weeks, according to people familiar with the matter, in a deal that could be worth roughly $40 billion or more.

The companies are discussing a price for Seagen above $200 a share and are seeking to seal a deal on or before the announcement of Merck's second fiscal-quarter earnings, set for July 28, the people said. Seagen's stock closed at $175.13 on Wednesday.

There is still no guarantee the companies will reach agreement on a takeover deal.

(More to Come)
